project_descr: Finalise a UNDP project document for the promotion of clean energy in Somalia, convene an Investment Summit on Renewable Energy and provide technical support for the installation of solar energy systems at public buildings.

outputs.output_descr: Output 1: Clean Energy Project Document; Output 2: Hold a Clean Energy Investment Summit for Somalia; Output 3: Provide Technical Support for Installation of Solar Energy Systems in Public Buildings
